p: Ahn et al. conducted a RCT including 100 patients with different gynecological cancers (cervical, endometrium and ovarian) receiving chemotherapy and Agaricus blazeii murill Kyowa or placebo ( Ahn et al., 2004). Patients showed improvements in terms of mood parameters (anxiety, depression, mental stability) and body strength compared to placebo on a modified EORTC-QLQ-C30. Between-group differences were not reported.
